title: American Rebirth: Civil War, National Recovery, and Prosperity
description: Girls are girls wherever they live—and the Sisters in Time series shows that girls are girls whenever they lived, too! This new collection brings together four historical fiction books for 8–12-year-old Elise the Climax of the Civil War (covering the year 1865), Janie’s African-Americans in the Aftermath of the Civil War (1867), Rachel and the The Labor Movement Divides a Family (1889), and Emily Makes a A Time of Progress and Problems (1893). American Rebirth will transport you back to America’s recovery of the late nineteenth century, teaching important lessons of history and Christian faith.
